TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RefreshMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 定義 方法如何處理開放式並行存取衝突。

span.span: Defines how the method handles optimistic concurrency conflicts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個列舉型別適用於所有多載。This enumeration applies to all overloads. ## Examples 下列範例會覆寫目前的值與資料庫中的值。The following example overwrites current values with values from the database. [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.RefreshMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.refreshmode/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.RefreshMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.refreshmode/vb/module1.vb#1)] 下列範例會示範如何從資料庫擷取的值與原始的值交換。The following example shows how to swap the original value with the values retrieved from the database. 未修改目前的值。No current value is modified. [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.RefreshMode#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.refreshmode/cs/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.RefreshMode#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.refreshmode/vb/module1.vb#2)] 下列範例會保留目前的值已變更，但資料庫值來更新其他值。The following example keeps the current values that have been changed, but updates the other values with database values. [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.RefreshMode#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.refreshmode/cs/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.RefreshMode#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.refreshmode/vb/module1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Linq.RefreshMode KeepChanges = int32(1)

summary.span: 強制讓 方法保留已變更的目前值，但以資料庫值來更新其他值。

span.span: Forces the method to keep the current value that has been changed, but updates the other values with the database values.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Linq.RefreshMode KeepCurrentValues = int32(0)

summary.span: 強制讓 方法將原始值與從資料庫中擷取的值交換。

span.span: Forces the method to swap the original value with the values retrieved from the database.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Linq.RefreshMode OverwriteCurrentValues = int32(2)

summary.span: 強制讓 方法使用資料庫中的值來覆寫所有目前值。

span.span: Forces the method to override all the current values with the values from the database.
